unnormalised: **Vela Tik-Tik Kortaa: Kityak Dates ani Times Azunui News Reportingant Gotalo Ghaltat**
normalised: Ghadi Vajte: Tariko ani Vel News Reportingant kiteak addchan haddtat

unnormalised: Oi soglleank! Kednaim eka news article-an dates ani times somzonk asokt zaleaat, kiteak te boro disonaa? Tum ekleach nhui! Hem ashchoryakarok ritin sadharan zataa, ani aiz, news ani mediant dates ani times sarkhe mellovop kitlench mhotvachem assa tea vishoyant uloium-ia. Tem fokot satyata vishayant nhui; tem spashtata, visvas ani mahiti soglleank upyogi assa hem nischit korche vishoyant assa.
normalised: Oi soglleank! Kednam konnacheanui news article-an tarih ani vel pollovn puro gundhol zala? Tum ekloch nhoi! Hem ashchoryakarok ritin sadharan zata, ani aiz, news ani media-nt tarih ani vel chukona korun ghevnk kiteak khup mhotvachem asa tacher uloya. Tem fokot chuk nastana korun ghevnk nhoi; tem spoxtta, visvas, ani soglleank mahiti upayukt asa mhonn nischit korun ghevnk asa.

unnormalised: Mhunnge, hanv Bangalore-ant eka novea flyover ughodpache vixim eka article vachot aslo. Article-an mhunnlam ki udghatan "yeta tea satolleant kednanch dorlola assa". Khorench? Yeta tea satollean kitem-i mhunn yevonk xoktaa! Tem 17/07/2024 assa? Vo magirchea satolleant? Hi अस्पष्टta ghara-gharaant assa.
normalised: Mhaka dislem mhonn hya disa mi Bangalore-ant nove flyover ugte korpak vixim ek article vachilem. Article-an sanglam ki udghatan "fudlea satolleant kednam tori kel'lem asa mhonn". Khorem? Fuddlem satollem mhonnlear kitem tori zata! Tem satra jula don hozar ani chollea (seventeenth july two thousand and twenty four) asa? Vo fuddlem satollem? Hi avyaktechi sthiti bhari asa.

unnormalised: Tachi chintna kor. Zori tum eka headline vachot asat jem mhunn'ta "RBI-n 2/2/24-ak ek novea policy-chi ghoshnna keli," tor tumak khobor astoli ki aiz tumchea current timezone-ant kitem diis assa? Vachpeak spasht, sankhipt mahiti zai, vishesh korun aiz. Zori ek article datetime notations-anchea gothalleant lede dhampita, tor vachpeank zobab mellovpak her kodden sodunk podtaa.
normalised: Tacher vichar korat. Zhor tumi ek headline vachit ki "R-B-I-n don february don hozar ani chollea (second february two thousand and twenty four) -cher novi policy jahir kelea", tumchea vortman timezone-ant to dis kitem asa mhonn tumka kolltolem? Vachpi spoxtt ani santpit mahiti asunk axe divpantat, khas korun aiz. Zannam ek article gundholit tarik ani vel notation-an mahiti bhorun dhorun lede mhonta, vachpeak zobab sodunk dusrea kodden pollovnk poddta.

unnormalised: Punn tem sogllem mhotvachea ghodnnuka vishim nasta. Eka movie review bhaxen thodde dischem sarkem assunk zai. Zori ek reviewer likhta, "1 tarikher premiere dhor," tor tankam 1 July mhunn zai? 1 August? Tem अस्पष्ट assa! Hi mahiti mhotvachi, vishesh korun zori tickets vegin vikun zatat.
normalised: Pun pun tem soglea mhotvache ghoddnecher nhoi. Even kitem tori dekhavpak lhan movie review-nkui barikayechi goroz asa. Zhor ek reviewer likhta, "Pahili tarihkek premiere pollya," tancho arth pahili jula mhonn asa? Pahili August? Tem aspoxtt asa! Hi mahiti mhotvachi, khas korun ticket vegim vikun veta tor.

unnormalised: Aspasht datetime formatting-achea ghatacho probhav keval tras divpachea bhair zata. Hem vishesh korun jito financial mahiti report kortana assa. Udahoronnak, "Ghoshnna uprant stock-anchea kimti poddleo" tankam vostavik date zai, mhunnge "03/01/2024". Tech bhaxen, eka tweet eka mhotvachea ghodnent dhaddlo, tachea somayan kontekst bodlunk xokta.
normalised: Chukiche tarik ani vel formatting-achem porinnam fokot tras divpak poriant odhik pois veta. Hem khas korun jannam financial mahiti report kortat tednam ghoddotta. Udahoronak, "Stock price jahir kel'lea uprant poddun gelo" taka khorea tarikechi goroz asa, mhonta "tin january don hozar ani chollea (third january two thousand and twenty four)". Toxench, jannam ek tweet ek mhotvache ghoddnukent pattoylo to vel parinnam puri ritin bodol kortolo.

unnormalised: Tor, kitem hea problemak bhag gheta? Hanv chint'ta ki kitem apnnim data prezent kortat te bhaxen kasoor assa. Thodde publications eka formal formatak chotton ravtat. Hanv chint'ta ki apnnim lachik assunk zai, zagoitlea audience-ank dolean dovrun. Udahoronnak, thodde Americanank dd/mm/yyyy format divonk xokta. Tea prakarant poorn date kityak likhinaat?
normalised: Tor, kiteak hem problem yeta? Mhaka dista kitem tori dosh ami mahiti mandunk kortat. Kaim patrika sadhea formatank chitton ravtat. Mhaka dista ami flexibole asunk zai, jagtik audience-n dhokiant dhorun. Udahoronak, kaim Americans-ank dis dis slash mhoino mhoino slash voros voros voros voros format-ant addchan yetali. Teach vellar tumi puri tarik kiteak likhina?

unnormalised: Tech bhaxen, news cycles kitlench vegim choltat tem ullekh korpachea layak assa. Reporters-acher sotani vegllean dabbo asta story-an ASAP publish korpak, jem editing ani fact-checking-ant chuko ghoddovonk xokta. Punn sach sangtam: dabbo satyata naxunk xamea mhunn nhoi.
normalised: Toxench, news cycle zata tednam teji vixim mandunk lagta. Reporters-ank vegim ani chuk nastana porgott korunk zai poddta, tem editing ani fact-checking-ant chukankarok asonk zata. Pun ami soth sanglya: dabav chuk nastana korun ghevnk karann nhoi.

unnormalised: Her bhag ghevnk zatelim zagoitlea ani sthanik timezones-anchi sankhya assa! Zori ek ghoddn 14:00 GMT-acher ghoddta, tor tem somay tum Mumbai-ant konnak sangonk xoktat, zata thoim 7:30 PM IST assa? Spasht timezone conversions vo datetime-anchea bhovtaleant kontekst mhotvacho assa.
normalised: Dusro karann jagtik ani sthanik timezone-anchi sonkhea! Zhor ek ghoddnuk chodda don hozar G-M-T-k ghoddotta, koso tum tem vel Mumbai-ant konnak relevant kortale, jityekadlea saat tis P-M I-S-T asa? Spoxtt timezone conversions vo tarik ani vel vixim sandarbh khup mhotvache asa.

unnormalised: Shevottak, news organizations ani journalists-ancher sarkhe dates ani times report korpachi zobabdari poddta. Tem spashtata-k poilem sthaan divpachea ani vachpeachea drishtikonak vichar korpachea vishayant assa. Zori dubhav assa, tor uchcharun sang! "Monsoon season sadharan June-chea 1 satolleant survat zata". Poloyat tem kitlench sonn assa?
normalised: Nimannem, sothek tarik ani vel report korpachi zababdari news organizations ani journalist-ancher asa. Tem spoxtta vaddovn ani vachpeachem vishwas dhokiant dhorun asa. Zhor dubhav asta, tor voll likh! "Monsoon season sadharan June-chea pahilea satolleant suru zata". Tumka kitlem sompem zata tem poll:

unnormalised: Tor, tum kednaim gothallea date vo time aslela ek news article vachot, apnnim uloin tem yaad dovrat! Hem fokot pedantic asopachea vishayant nhoi; tem mahiti soglleank sodanch ani upyogi assa hem nischit korpachea vishayant assa. Apnn news sources-anche kadun spashtata ani satyata magunk zai!
normalised: Tor, tumchea fudlea vellar tumi ek news article gundholit tarik vo vel-ant vachit tor, ami uloilele mud'dea yad dovrat! Hem fokot pedantic nhoi; tem mahiti upolabd asa ani soglleank upayukt asa mhonn nischit korun asa. Ami amchea news source-ancho spoxtta ani sothek ulo diunchea!
